languages.text: {n}Некоторое время из вокса доносится лишь стрекот металлических манипуляторов Вигдис.{/n} "Обет Императора" — крейсер, несущий в себе до ста двадцати тысяч экипажа. Длина корпуса: шесть тысяч метров. Ширина: тысяча метров. Предполагаемый срок службы во флоте династии Винтерскейл... несколько тысячелетий".

traits.locale_text: {n}Некоторое время из вокса доносится лишь стрекот металлических манипуляторов Вигдис.{/n} "Обет Императора" — гранд-крейсер типа "Мститель", несущий в себе до ста двадцати тысяч экипажа. Длина корпуса: шеть тысяч километров. Ширина: тысяча километров. Предполагаемый срок службы во флоте династии Винтерскейл... несколько тысячелетий".

languages.text: {n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is a cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand metres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время из вокса доносится лишь стрекот металлических манипуляторов Вигдис.{/n} "Обет Императора" — крейсер, несущий в себе до ста двадцати тысяч экипажа. Длина корпуса: шесть тысяч метров. Ширина: тысяча метров. Предполагаемый срок службы во флоте династии Винтерскейл... несколько тысячелетий".

traits.locale_text: {n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n}"Oath of the Emperor is an 'Avenger'-class Grand Cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew members. Hull length, six thousand kilometres. Hull width, one thousand kilometres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

{n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n}"Oath of the Emperor is an 'Avenger'-class Grand Cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew members. Hull length, six thousand kilometres. Hull width, one thousand kilometres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

{n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is an 'Avenger' class Grand Cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand kilometres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

{n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is an 'Avenger' class Grand Cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand kilometres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

{n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is a cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand metres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

languages.text: {n}在接下来的一段时间里，音阵频道只传来了维格迪斯的金属操纵器的咔哒声。{/n}“帝皇誓约号是一艘巡洋舰，载有多达12万名船员。总长度为6000米，舰宽约为1000米，估计已经在温特斯凯尔王朝服役长达……数千年之久。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is a cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand metres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

traits.locale_text: {n}在接下来的一段时间里，音阵频道只传来了维格迪斯的金属操纵器的咔哒声。{/n}“帝皇誓约号是一艘巡洋舰，载有多达12万名船员。总长度为6000米，舰宽约为1000米，估计已经在温特斯凯尔王朝服役长达……数千年之久。”

languages.text: {n}Pendant quelques instants, le vox ne diffuse que le cliquetis des manipulateurs métalliques de Vigdis.{/n} « Le Serment de l'Empereur est un croiseur capable d'embarquer jusqu'à cent vingt mille membres d'équipage. Longueur totale : six mille mètres. Faisceau : mille kilomètres. Durée de service estimée dans la flotte de la dynastie Winterscale : plusieurs millénaires. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is a cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand metres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pendant quelques instants, le vox ne diffuse que le cliquetis des manipulateurs métalliques de Vigdis.{/n} « Le Serment de l'Empereur est un croiseur capable d'embarquer jusqu'à cent vingt mille membres d'équipage. Longueur totale : six mille mètres. Faisceau : mille kilomètres. Durée de service estimée dans la flotte de la dynastie Winterscale : plusieurs millénaires. »

languages.text: {n}Das Vox überträgt eine Weile nur das Klicken von Vigdis' Metallmanipulatoren.{/n} "Die Eid des Imperators ist ein Kreuzer mit einer bis zu 120.000 Mann starken Besatzung. Gesamtlänge: sechstausend Meter. Breite: eintausend Meter. Geschätzte Dienstzeit in der Flotte der Winterzunder-Dynastie ... mehrere Jahrtausende."
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is a cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand metres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox überträgt eine Weile nur das Klicken von Vigdis' Metallmanipulatoren.{/n} "Die Eid des Imperators ist ein Kreuzer mit einer bis zu 120.000 Mann starken Besatzung. Gesamtlänge: sechstausend Meter. Breite: eintausend Meter. Geschätzte Dienstzeit in der Flotte der Winterzunder-Dynastie ... mehrere Jahrtausende."

{n}Das Vox überträgt eine Weile nur das Klicken von Vigdis' Metallmanipulatoren.{/n} "Die Emperor's Vow ist ein Großer Kreuzer der 'Rächer'-Klasse und kann bis zu einhundertzwanzigtausend Mann als Crew aufnehmen. Gesamtlänge: sechstausend Meter. Breite: eintausend Kilometer. Geschätzte Dienstzeit in der Flotte der Winterzunder-Dynastie ... mehrere Jahrtausende."

languages.text: {n}Durante un momento, el voco solo emite el chasquido de los manipuladores metálicos de Vigdis.{/n} «El Voto del Emperador es un crucero que alberga una tripulación de ciento veinte mil personas. Eslora total: seis mil metros. Manga: mil metros. Tiempo de servicio en la flota de la dinastía Winterscale... varios milenios».
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is a cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand metres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

traits.locale_text: {n}Durante un momento, el voco solo emite el chasquido de los manipuladores metálicos de Vigdis.{/n} «El Voto del Emperador es un crucero que alberga una tripulación de ciento veinte mil personas. Eslora total: seis mil metros. Manga: mil metros. Tiempo de servicio en la flota de la dinastía Winterscale... varios milenios».

languages.text: {n}しばらくの間、ヴォクスからはヴィグディスの金属マニピュレーターのカチカチという音だけが聞こえていた。{/n}「『皇帝の誓い』号は、最大12万人の乗組員を乗せる巡洋艦です。全長6000メートル、全幅1000メートル。ウィンタースケール王朝艦隊での推定稼働期間は…数千年です」
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is a cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand metres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."

traits.locale_text: {n}しばらくの間、ヴォクスからはヴィグディスの金属マニピュレーターのカチカチという音だけが聞こえていた。{/n}「『皇帝の誓い』号は、最大12万人の乗組員を乗せる巡洋艦です。全長6000メートル、全幅1000メートル。ウィンタースケール王朝艦隊での推定稼働期間は…数千年です」

languages.text: {n}Vokstan bir müddet yalnızca Vigdis'in metal çevirteçlerinin sesi geliyor.{/n} "İmparator'un Andı, yüz yirmi bin kişilik mürettebat kapasitesine sahip bir kruvazördür. Toplam uzunluğu: Altı bin metre. Işın menzili: Bin metre. Winterscale hanedanlığı filosundaki yaklaşık hizmet süresi: Birkaç bin yıl."
languages.original_text: {n}For a while, the vox broadcasts only the clicking of Vigdis's metallic manipulators.{/n} "The Emperor's Vow is a cruiser carrying up to one hundred and twenty thousand crew. Length overall: six thousand metres. Beam: one thousand metres. Estimated time of service in the Winterscale dynasty fleet... several millennia."
